description:
An open letter signed by 270 scientists and researchers across 33 countries has raised major technical concerns about the EU’s proposed regulation mandating the scanning of messaging apps for child sexual abuse material (CSAM). The signees argue the techniques are fundamentally flawed and will “completely undermine communications and systems security.” “From a technical standpoint, to... Read more »

The post Open letter criticises ‘flawed’ CSAM scanning plan appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Open letter criticises ‘flawed’ CSAM scanning plan
